author: Quick Edit
title: Quick Edit: Racism hurts war against Covid-19
description: Yesterday the Union health ministry issued an advisory to all states to sensitize law enforcement agencies to act against harassment of people from the northeast, after several reports of racial attacks linking them to the...
content:
Yesterday the Union health ministry issued an advisory to all states to sensitize law enforcement agencies to act against harassment of people from the northeast, after several reports of racial attacks linking them to the Covid-19 pandemic.
